parameters.name: AutoReceiveAllRoute
parameters.description:
Whether to automatically receive all routes from all instances under this Lingjun HUB. Valid values:

*   **true**: received automatically.
*   **false**: Not received.

parameters.name: EnablePage
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable paged query. Valid values:

*   **true**: enables paged query.
*   **false**: Paged query is not enabled.

parameters.name: ErAttachmentId
parameters.description: The ID of the network instance connection

parameters.name: ErAttachmentName
parameters.description: The name of the network instance connection.

parameters.name: ErId
parameters.description: The ID of the Lingjun HUB instance.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the network instance. Valid values: **VPD** and **VCC**.

For more information, see [What is Lingjun?](https://help.aliyun.com/document_detail/444430.html)

You can query **Lingjun CIDR blocks** and **Lingjun connections** by [ListVpds](https://help.aliyun.com/document_detail/2331077.html) and [ListVccs](https://help.aliyun.com/document_detail/2399526.html?) respectively.

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description:
The mitigation plan of the instance. Valid values:

*   **VPD**: indicates the Lingjun CIDR block.
*   **VCC**: indicates a Lingjun connection.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: ResourceTenantId
parameters.description: The ID of the tenant to which the instance belongs.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the CLB instance. Valid values:

*   **Available**: Normal.
*   **Not Available**: Not available.
*   **Executing**: The task is being executed.
*   **Deleting**: The account is being deleted
